definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
Stamford Raffles (1781-1826), British statesman and founder of the city of Singapore
pinyin: Si1 tan3 fu2 · Lai2 fo2 shi4

sentences.english: He has a PhD in computer science from Stanford University.
sentences.chinese: 他拥有斯坦福大学计算机科学博士学位。

sentences.english: The Stanford-Berkley competition is mostly sports-related.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦福和伯克利之间的竞争大多是与运动相关的。

sentences.english: He's been wait-listed for a football scholarship to Stanford .
sentences.chinese: 他已被列入斯坦福大学的美式足球奖学金等候者名单。

sentences.english: Stanford buys 100, 000 volumes a year — or 273 every day.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦福每年购买10万卷图书，也就是每天273卷。

sentences.english: They used to be in Stamford.
sentences.chinese: 他们过去也在斯坦福德。

sentences.english: The incident happened at Stafford hospital on 30 October.
sentences.chinese: 这场医疗事故发生在10月30日的斯坦福德医院。

sentences.english: You come to Stanford, you know, such a high bar.
sentences.chinese: 你们来到斯坦福，你知道的，这么高的门槛。

sentences.english: He told the paper the Bidens never met or communicated with Stanford.
sentences.chinese: 他说，拜登家族从未与斯坦福见过面或沟通过。

sentences.english: Scolari, meanwhile, is relishing his new role at the Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 斯科拉里正在斯坦福桥享受自己的新角色。

sentences.english: But it is true to keep a clean sheet at Stamford Bridge would be a big help for us.
sentences.chinese: 但在斯坦福桥保持零封将会对我们非常有利却是真的。

sentences.english: Stanford chemical engineer Zhenan Bao is working on just such a thing.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦福大学化学工程师鲍哲南正在研究这样的材料。

sentences.english: Yet he has also conceded, privately, that it would be a huge wrench to leave Stamford Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 但是特里私下承认斯坦福桥让他难以割舍。

sentences.english: What about Pitney Bowes?They used to be in Stamford.
sentences.chinese: 皮德尼。鲍怎么样了？他们过去也在斯坦福德。

sentences.english: He is currently the Paul L. & Phyllis Wattis Professor in Art, Department of Art & Art History, Stanford University, California.
sentences.chinese: 他目前是加州斯坦福大学艺术与艺术史系的终身教授。

sentences.english: It's the nicest restaurant in Stamford.
sentences.chinese: 那是斯坦福德最好的餐厅。

sentences.english: So the Drogs will miss our key match against Arsenal at Stamford Bridge in a couple weeks.
sentences.chinese: 所以德罗巴会错过在斯坦福桥对阵阿森纳的比赛。

pinyin: Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2
Ka3 nei4 ji1 Mei2 long2 Da4 xue2
Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2

definition: University of California/abbr. for 加利福尼亞大學|加利福尼亚大学[Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2]

pinyin: Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2
